org.springframework.social.bitbucket.api

Interface PrivilegeOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PrivilegeTemplate

    public interface PrivilegeOperations

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<RepoPrivilege> getRepoPrivileges(String user, String repoSlug)
      Get the privileges on a given repository.
      void removePrivilege(String owner, String repoSlug, String recipient)
      Removes the current privilege of the given recipient from some repository.
      RepoPrivilege setPrivilege(String owner, String repoSlug, String recipient, BitBucketPrivilege privilege)
      Set or change the privilege for the given recipient on some repository.

    • Method Detail

      • getRepoPrivileges

        List<RepoPrivilege> getRepoPrivileges(String user,
                                    String repoSlug)
        Get the privileges on a given repository.
        Parameters:
        user - repository owner
        repoSlug - name of the repository

      • setPrivilege

        RepoPrivilege setPrivilege(String owner,
                         String repoSlug,
                         String recipient,
                         BitBucketPrivilege privilege)
        Set or change the privilege for the given recipient on some repository.
        Parameters:
        owner - the repository owner
        repoSlug - the repository name
        recipient - user for which to set the privilege
        privilege - new privilege value to set

      • removePrivilege

        void removePrivilege(String owner,
                   String repoSlug,
                   String recipient)
        Removes the current privilege of the given recipient from some repository.
        Parameters:
        owner - the repository owner
        repoSlug - the repository name
        recipient - user for which to remove the privilege
